alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 10:17AM MST until January 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST MONDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Moderate snow amounts expected above 6000 feet, with lighter amounts down to 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches, with higher amounts near Buffalo Pass. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 6000 feet near Buffalo Pass, Ganado and Window Rock. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow forecast from 11 AM Today to 11 AM Monday: Buffalo Pass 4 to 8 inches Ganado 1 to 3 inches Window Rock 1 to 3 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
